summary: Meet Tara: Lightning themed, dual-wield, offense focused Nord Warrior
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3c78d8][size=4]About Her:[/size][/color]

First and foremost, a little warning.  The main reason I created her is because of the difficulty mods that I used.  Such as Sands of Time,
ASIS, Extra Encounters, Skyrim Community Uncapper, [size=2]Revenge Of the Enemies etc.  Any follower I installed before her got brought down to their
knees, literally.  And yes, healers too.  So I decided to make my own.  But instead of adding loads of health, magicka and stamina.  Or
insane amount of damage.  I added [/size]abilities that makes her more effective on the battle field without depending on one or two
types of attacks.  So for the ones who do not use any difficulty mods, there is a nerfed and vanilla versions of her.  All her versions have
no caps.  She will use any type of body you install.  And she will be dressed in a random fur armor

[color=#3c78d8]Profile:[/color]

[size=2]Name: Tara Blithe[/size]
Race: Nord
Class: Custom (1H, light armor, archer, sneak)
Combat Style: Balanced(ranger, close combat and mid-range: depends on what weapon you give her)
Abilities:
ShockWave - a semi-fast thuum that shocks a hand full of enemies for a few seconds
Disarm shout - Modified to match ShockWave
Sparks - Same as lightning cloak but activated when hostiles are near
Enhance Combat Spell - Increase the speed of dual wield with more chance of bash attacks
Electro Blast - Any ground NPC she hits with an arrow, will get a small explosion of lightning

[color=#3c78d8]Location:

[/color][size=2][color=#00ff00]Honningbrew Meadery[/color]

[/size][size=4][color=#ff0000]Requirements:[/color]

[/size]*Body Mod of your choosing
*High Quality skin textures for that body

[color=#3c78d8][size=4]Installation and load order:

[/size][/color]I highly recommend using a mod manager to keep everything organized and stable
*Manual Installation (NOT RECOMMENDED) - Once the requirements are installed.  Download and extract the archive
with [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-zip[/url] or a similar program. Place the contents in the Skyrim's 'Data' folder.
*To Un-install - Delete placed contents
*Load Order - (from top) 1. Body mod  2. Skin Texture mod  3. This mod

[color=#3c78d8][size=4]Credits:

[/size][/color][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url][/size] by [b]Expired[/b]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url][/size] by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641]Ravens Warpaint[/url][/size] by [b]Raven
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989]CITRUS Heads[/url][/size] by [b]Blabba
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22971]Silver Armor[/url][/size] by [b]Acolyte598 (armor in the screenshot)
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36336]aMidianBorn Tsun[/url][/size] by [b]CaBaL
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834]Demoniac- High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture[/url][/size] by [b]Regenbot03
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] [/size]by [b]Ousnius and Caliente
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/url][/size] by [b]Gopher
[/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/size] by [b]Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam[/b][/center]
author: hyde606
